title: Register valid user
steps: Open /register; fill all mandatory fields; click Register
expected: User account created and redirected to Contact List

title: Register invalid email
steps: Open /register; enter invalid email; click Register
expected: Validation error displayed for email field

title: Login with valid credentials
steps: Open /login; enter valid email & password; click Login
expected: User successfully logged in and navigated to /contacts

title: Add contact with valid data
steps: Login; go to Add Contact; fill form with valid details; click Save
expected: Contact added and visible in list

title: Add contact invalid email
steps: Enter an invalid email in Add Contact form

title: Edit existing contact
steps: Login; create a contact; edit fields; Save

title: Delete a contact
steps: Login; add contact; click Delete; confirm popup

title: Search contact (if available)
steps: Enter name in search box (if present)

title: Direct URL access to contact details
